function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure of network connectivity leading to inability to access medical data and instructions","Impact":"Death or critical condition of patients, inability to receive timely care and instructions","Mitigation":"Improving network reliability and speed, implementing backup connectivity options","Technologies":"Network monitoring tools, redundant network infrastructure, load balancing","People":"Medical staff, patients","Owner":"Network administrators, IT department"},{"Description":"Inefficient dissemination of quality research leading to challenges for medical staff","Impact":"Disruption of medical services, inadequate information for patient care","Mitigation":"Improving research publication processes, implementing collaborative platforms for sharing information","Technologies":"Research publication platforms, collaborative research tools","People":"Medical researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission risk of COVID-19 through mobile applications","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19, potential exposure of individuals to the virus","Mitigation":"Implementing contact tracing and tracking features in mHealth applications, promoting risk awareness and preventive measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing algorithms, location tracking technologies","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health authorities, app developers"}]}
